entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
